title: 2014/676/EU: Council Decision of 25 September 2014 appointing a Czech alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
27.9.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 283/56
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 September 2014
appointing a Czech alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2014/676/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the CzechGovernment,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and on 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU (1) and 2010/29/EU (2) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015. On 24 September 2012, by Council Decision 2012/524/EU (3), Mr Milan CHOVANEC was appointed alternate member until 25 January 2015.
(2) An alternate member's seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Milan CHOVANEC,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed as alternate member to the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
— Mr Václav ŠLAJS, Hejtman Plzeňského kraje.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 September 2014.
For the Council
The President
F. GUIDI
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22.
(2)  OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
(3)  OJ L 263, 28.9.2012, p. 41.
